title: Baker Mayfield!! + NFL Week 3 Picks Against the Spread, DFS, Gambling Advice (Football 09/21)
description:
Will Brinson and John Breech freak the geek out over Baker Mayfield storming the Browns back from a big deficit to give them their first win in 635 days. Then Will is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White to make SuperContest picks for every single game on the Week 3 slate. And THEN Will is joined by Nick Kostos to take a look at every single game from a degenerate angle --who is best to play in DFS, what picks does Kostos like and much more. Loaded show for the weekend!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: John Breech joins Will Brinson to talk Jets-Browns then R.J. White & Pete Prisco join the show to make SuperContest picks before Nick Kostos joins to look at every Week 3 game from a gambling angle.
